file_content.text: It's a shame my brother had to die for us to recognize Doctor Tabo for the lunatic he really was.
Lieutenant Tamso? I have some information concerning your brother....
So... it was sabotage. I should've known Tabo was lying.
I warned Arick it was dangerous to meddle with the Colicoids. Guess I should've warned him about Doctor Tabo, instead.
Is there enough evidence to convict him?
If what you say is true, there should be proof that these implants were tampered with. That alone should prove his guilt.
Yes, you've done more than enough already.
Thank you for bringing me this evidence. I'll get these implants to our technicians, and we'll have Doctor Tabo locked up in no time.
It's time we did something about those Colicoids. I say vaporize the lot of them.
